ygData.subject: Re: Any price recommendations?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This is incorrect. I can (Magician) give weapons to other players. I have to hand them out a lot in Unrest. Ghouls can t be hit by brute force alone. But
ygData.messageBody:
> summoned weapons i think you cannot give to others with last fixes wich are
> introduced to spell sistem only to pets.

This is incorrect. I can (Magician) give weapons to other players. I
have to hand them out a lot in Unrest. Ghouls can't be hit by brute
force alone. But as for the pet thing, that too is wrong (once again for
mages). Mage pet's can't wield weapons (of course you CAN give weapons
to magician pets, and they say Thank you.

-Zikkin
